short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reads HTML page and generates cover letters based on the HTML

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically generates cover letters based on job descriptions and your LinkedIn profile.
You can also adjust your cover letters using simple chat interface, or instantly rebuild them in one click.
